DOC.criteria: Generally healthy men postmenopausal woman age 50 BMI 18.535 kg/m2 Cigarette smoking and/or nicotine replacement use History know allergy nut kind Regular consumption ≥ 5 oz nuts/week 6 week prior study admission Individuals take estrogen Use cholesterollowering medication Gastrointestinal disease Kidney disease Endocrine disease : include diabetes , untreated thyroid disease Rheumatoid arthritis Active treatment type cancer , except basal cell carcinoma , within 1 year prior study admission Systolic blood pressure > 150 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure > 95 mmHg Regular use oral steroid Regular daily intake ≥ 2 alcoholic drink Illicit drug use No fish oil supplement ( include cod liver oil ) 6 week prior study admission No high dose ( ≥ 3X RDA ) supplement vitamin C , E , selenium , betacarotene one month prior study admission No dietary supplement contain phenolic compound , i.e. , herbal preparation , berry contain preparation ( cranberry capsule ) one month prior study admission No regular consumption pomegranate juice ( ≥ 180 mL 6 oz/d , ≥ 3 times/wk ) one month prior study admission
